meanings.sent1: The horizonal sun cast long shadows in the evening.
meanings.sent2: The shelf was placed in a horizonal position to hold the books.
meanings.sent3: The horizonal road seemed to stretch endlessly, like a never-ending journey.
meanings.sent4: Her horizonal gaze across the vast ocean made her feel at peace.
meanings.sent5: The horizonal stripes on the wall created a sense of spaciousness in the room.

meanings.sent1: The artist carefully drew a horizonal on the canvas to represent the sea.
meanings.sent2: The horizonal of the ocean met the sky in a perfect line.
meanings.sent3: The horizonal on the map seemed to lead to a hidden treasure.
meanings.sent4: The horizonal of the field divided the landscape neatly.
meanings.sent5: The horizonal of the building's roof blended seamlessly with the sky.
